p: We suggest that while each of the treatments employed in this study was crucial to the restorationâ€™s success, the repeated addition of a diverse seed mix was likely the key factor explaining our dramatic results. Of the species recorded in 2019 that were not recorded in the first year of the survey, 82% were included in the seed mixes ( S1 and S2 Tables). This suggests that unassisted colonization was not the primary explanation for increased species richness and Floristic Quality.
